response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and prestige. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $1,200,000. For a limited time, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $1,150,000. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to acquiring the finest offerings. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1150000}
